Pre-Course Curriculum

Tools Installation

If you haven’t already, make sure you’ve installed the following on your machine:

  1. Sublime Text 3, a powerful, lightweight text editor
  2. Google Chrome, the browser you’ll use for development
  3. If you’re on a Mac, Xcode Command Line Tools:
    • for Mavericks
    • for Mountain Lion
    • other versions of OS X: download from Apple (free sign-up required)
  4. Git, a version-control system
  5. SourceTree, an optional GUI for Git
  6. Sign up for a GitHub account
  • Mac users: Place Terminal in your Dock
  • Windows users: Place Git Bash (installed with Git) in your Start menu

Background for the Course

  1. Complete Web Fundamentals on Codecademy
  2. Watch Console Foundations on Treehouse
  3. Watch Git Basics on Treehouse
